title: The Circle's Jack & Beth given second as 62-year-old after double dumping
text:
Will Jack and Beth have better luck this time round? (Picture: Channel 4)

The Circle have dealt one hell of a devilish twist with Jack and Beth becoming the first double dumping of the series – only for them to go back in as a new player.

Jack, who has been playing as himself, and Beth, who traded in her model looks for ‘more approachable, girl next door persona’ (whatever that means), came in at the same time, only to be eliminated two days later after failing to make an impression on the rest of the players.

But now in a twist, they’re getting a new lease of life – as a 62-year-old dog lover named Joyce.

After the public voted for them to remain in the game under a new persona, instead of a new couple who were going to come in as someone else.

The couple were given the opportunity after automatic elimination from the game for being the lowest ranked of all the players.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Meeting each other face-to-face, Jack got a bit of a shock when he finally met ‘Beth’ – and she was a completely different person to the one in her photos.

How will the game react to Joyce? (Picture: Channel 4)

…Which is made even more awkward seeing as they were flirting the day before (but then again Jack flirts with everything).

Now they’ve moved into Richard Madeley’s old flat, setting up home together for the foreseeable as the first ever pair to appear as one contestant on the show.

More: The Circle The Circle: Paddy tears up as he confides in Georgina about his cerebral palsy Woody turns detective with Ella on The Circle to sniff out any catfishing contestants What time is The Circle on Channel 4 tonight and what's the latest twist?

Can they manage to evade detection and stay in the game a little longer this time?

Even worse, are they going to be able to survive living in such close quarters without killing each other in the process?

The Circle continues tomorrow at 10pm on Channel 4.

description: The Circle gave Jack and Beth a second chance at playing the game as they unite forces to become a 62-year-old dog lover named Joyce.
